title: Xayah and Rakan icon
body:
Hello, I gifted a friend Rakan on the 24th of April 2 days before the promotion was up and read that we should have the icon within 2 weeks of the promotion ending now that it has been 2 weeks i'm just left a bit worried as I still have not received my icon and do not think that they are going to be sending them out anymore was just wondering if there was a way we could get some sort of quick fix or sitrep to just ease my nerves a bit. 

Thank You,

replies.body: I have yet to receive mine either. Hope Riot finishes distributing the icons today.
Looks like you've already received it as well!

It took a bit to distribute the icons because there were so many eligible players.  I've looked into your case and it actually looks like you already received the icon.  :P  Double check your list and you should see it!
